Title: Provides a preference for New York state contractors for purposes of public works contracts
Summary: Provides a preference for New York state contractors for purposes of public works contracts; authorizes the commissioner of economic development and the commissioner of labor to promulgate necessary rules and regulations; requires a report to the legislature; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 9 ยง149, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to providing a preference to New York state contractors for purposes of public works contracts
